title: Harpers Ferry National Historical Park: Support Your Park
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Support Your Park             Support Your Park         2011 Potomac Watershed Clean-up NPS Photo  There are many ways to help and enjoy your national parks. At Harpers Ferry you can:   Volunteer, maybe become a Volunteer of the Month!   Donate to the park or Harpers Ferry Historical Association   Purchase an item at the bookshop (proceeds support park programs.)   Thanks for helping out and being part of our team!
